availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

person.persName: Price N. Penston (Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, p. 12.
Find A Grave, "Price N. Peniston (1818-April 28, 1908)," Memorial #113119688, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113119688 (accessed April 19, 2018).
